item.meatweapons.basic_pistol.lore_0:
Cobbled together from reanimated flesh.
Comes with a pistol module preinstalled.
Passively generates ammunition from food.
Click with a food item in an inventory to feed.
item.meatweapons.meatgun_pistol.lore_0: A lightweight Meatgun base with a pistol grip.
item.meatweapons.meatgun_staff.lore_0: A Meatgun base that is held like a staff. Works best with melee attachments.
item.meatweapons.long_gun.lore_0: A Meatgun base with a built-in stock that can support more modules.
item.meatweapons.assault_drill.lore: Shred your enemies! Amuse your friends! Guaranteed to break the ice at parties!
item.meatweapons.airtruck.lore_0: A flying vehicle that carries a pilot and a passenger.
meatgun_module.meatweapons.bosher.desc: Projects numerous fragments over a wide area.
meatgun_module.meatweapons.long_boi.desc:
Shoots a blinding beam that can hit multiple targets.
Charges when the trigger is held and fires when released. Must be charged for at least 2s to fire, indicated by two beeps.
After 4s, the beam becomes explosive. 
§cAfter 6.5s, the pulse chamber will overload, killing the user.
meatgun_module.meatweapons.grenade_launc: Launches grenades that bounce off surfaces and explode on contact with entities.
meatgun_module.meatweapons.triple_carous: Allows three modules. Trigger signals are passed to the topmost module. Rotates to the next module after either trigger is pressed.
meatgun_module.meatweapons.underbarrel.d:
Supports two modules, on below the other.
The primary trigger is passed to the upper module and the secondary secondary is passed to the lower one.
meatgun_module.meatweapons.battery.desc: Stores 16 extra units of energy ammunition.
Adds a homing effect to large (entity) projectiles produced by the weapon.
Draws out an enemy's bones when they are damaged, converting them into ammunition for a random Meatgun in the hotbar.
meatgun_module.meatweapons.slow_barrel.d: Makes projectiles into entities when installed in a BARREL slot.
meatgun_module.meatweapons.phage_ray_spe: Increases the mining speed of the Phage Ray
meatgun_module.meatweapons.short_phage_r: Breaks the targeted block in a 15 block range. One ammunition unit is consumed per 8 blocks broken. Can be enchanted.
meatgun_module.meatweapons.halberd.desc:
Trigger 1: Normal melee attack.
Trigger 2 (sprinting): Launches forwards when held and released after half a second.
Trigger 2 (mounted): hooks and drags the target for a second.
meatgun_module.meatweapons.shock_staff.d:
Trigger 1: Normal melee attack.
Trigger 2: Shoots a projectile.
meatgun_module.meatweapons.x2_firing_mec: 2x rate of fire, 0.5x damage, 0.5x ammunition usage.
meatgun_module.meatweapons.x8_firing_mec: 8x rate of fire, 0.125x damage, 0.125x ammunition usage.
implant.meatweapons.blood_bullet_provide: Converts the user's blood into bullets when out of Meatgun ammunition.
implant.meatweapons.magazine_organ.desc_: Allows eating of up to eight ammunition items for storage.
implant.meatweapons.ammunition_generator:
When installed in a Meatgun, gradually produces ammunition using metabolic substrate
Produces 1 unit every 2s.
tooltip.meatweapons.meatgun_module_1: Meatgun Module - install in a Tinker Table
message.meatweapons.item_implant.title: Item Implant
